body_html:
Before now, the only way for a user to get an API token was for an admin to generate one. This kind of sucks, so I made some APIs and UI for it. I'm pretty confident about the API design, but I'm not sure about how it is exposed in the UI. Suggestions are welcome here.

I tried to fit in with the changes in #342, but I expect I'll have to deal with merge conflicts one that lands.

@Osmose can you review the Python bits here?

@andymikulski Can you review the JS stuff?
title: Add controls for users to manage API keys
